question:
With reference to the recent declaration of the extinction of the Chinese Paddlefish, consider the following statements:
  1. It is a freshwater fish.
  2. Its extinction was due to competition with invasive species.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Chinese paddlefish was recently reported to have gone extinct functionally. It is thought that there are no more viable breeding pairs of this freshwater species. It is one of the largest freshwater fishes of the Yangtze River. It is also known as the Chinese swordfish. Statement 2 is incorrect: The large freshwater fish was mainly wiped out by overfishing and pollution apart from dam building activity on the Yangtze River. In the beginning of January, the Chinese government had imposed a ban on commercial fishing on the Yangtze River. The fish is also called the ‘Panda of the Yangtze River’.
